summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1253, for the improvement of Eight Avenue South, from Bradford Street to the south boundary line of the City of Seattle; certain parts of certain other streets, in the City of Seattle, therein named, by constructing water mains, gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 13766 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
